sentences.en: Southern farmers enshrine tombs on hillside terraces.
sentences.cn: 南方人把坟墓盖在山上.

sentences.en: The apartheid system which enshrined racism in law still existed.
sentences.cn: 以法律形式保护种族主义的种族隔离制度依然存在着。

sentences.en: This system is enshrined in our Constitution.
sentences.cn: 我们的宪法使该制度神圣而不可侵犯。

sentences.en: We are now going to go for domestic legislation [ which ] will enshrine some targets.
sentences.cn: 我们将在国内 立法 以确定一些目标.

trans.tran_cn: 铭记，珍藏；把…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣
trans.tran_en: if something such as a tradition or right is enshrined in something, it is preserved and protected so that people will remember and respect it

trans.tran_cn: 珍藏，铭记，把…奉为神圣，秘藏，把…置于神龛内
